name: Task Manager OS
description: Never miss a To-do thanks to the Task Manager Notion template.Do you have difficulties keeping track of your tasks?The Notion Task Manager is made for you! Use this template to effectively manage your tasks, stay organized, and never miss an important to-do again.Be more productive and organized every day.Create tasks using the convenient "New Task" button and organize them based on different timelines, including "Today," "Next 7 days," "Overdue," and "Near future".Get things done easily by orga
